## Learning Outcomes {.ch}

After completing Class 25 you should...

* Know the definition/defining equation for factors, measured/predicted response, experimental design, factorial design, predicted responses model, kinetics parameter, parameter estimation, uncertainty, 95% confidence interval, standard error, coefficient of determination, parity plot, and residuals plot
* Understand
    * the procedure for developing a rate expression
    * how a numerical fitting function works and how to use one
* Be able to
    * design a set of kinetics experiments
    * estimate pre-exponential factors using their base-10 logarithm as the fitting parameter
    * assess the accuracy of a proposed rate expression
